header.title: BOOKS
header.description: I have a poor memory so here I am creating a site to remember what books I've read and what I thought

contentSections.text: If you'd like to contact me, you can do so here:

I personally enjoy back-end more than front-end, but because of that I've decided to take the time to make sure that I have appropriate skills to develop front-ends that can satisfy any user to some degree.

footer.contactText: Feel free to reach out if you want to talk about books, programming, or anything else!
